It is comfortable and warm...yet after one full day at work I went home and realized there was a hole under the left arm. I will have to mend that. And there is something I don't like about the way the top buttons/neckline looks when you leave it open and honestly when you button it up too. Because of these issues I do wish it was a little cheaper, however I still think it is adorable and perfect for Valentine's/Spring. I hope that helps anyone trying to decide to purchase or not.
